transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji mam, kaun kiye the aap?
Customer: Good afternoon mam, Pallavi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Good afternoon. Actually main raste mein thi na toh nahi dekh payi, bag mein tha mera phone.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai mam aapko? Aapka woh baat hua Shiv...
Customer: Haan ji bilkul aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji mam, woh ho gaya toh woh unka resolve ho gaya problem?
Customer: Resolve ho gaya hai?
Executive: Haan haan, sir bole the ki baat ho gayi hai woh sort out ho gaya.
Customer: Toh aap IndiaMART mein Sahil ji se baat ho gayi hai?
Executive: Kinse Sahil? Nahi abhi toh mam kuch nahi bol rahe hain. Shiv Shankar ji se aap baat kar rahi hai mam.
Customer: Haan Shiv Shankar ji se baat ho gayi hai sir ji, sir bole hain woh clear ho gaya.
Executive: Toh unko boliye na abhi koi aur, haan toh Shiv Shankar...
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aur koi complaint nahi hai, Shiv Shankar ji ki hi complaint hai.
Executive: Aap unko boliye na ki Shiv Shankar ji se aap IndiaMART se complaint wapas le lijiye.
Customer: Achha theek hai, main bol deti hu. Kyunki dekhiye meri baat hui thi unse but unhone mujhe kuch bataya hi nahi.
Executive: Haan fir sir bol rahe the baat nahi, baki toh...
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mam dekhiye waise meri jo team hai Sahil jo aapka yeh complaint handle kar rahe hain, Sahil ji call karenge unko, theek hai? Aur jab woh call karenge toh woh bol de ki haan mere ko koi complaint nahi hai against HR sir se. Agar woh aisa keh denge toh woh complaint aapka close ho jayega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai mam, jo aapne...
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Mam aapka jo hamare paas ek ek feedback aaya tha ki aapko help and support nahi mil raha hai hamari service team se. Toh I think mam abhi teen chaar din se toh hum log coordinate karke aapka ek complaint toh already resolve ho gaya hai, Shiv Shankar wala bhi resolve ho jayega. Toh woh aapka complaint close kar de mam yahan se?
Customer: Haan ji close kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai mam aapka...
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai, bilkul bilkul close. Akhil koi Akhil ji se...
Customer: Akhil ji se baat toh nahi karni iske regarding?
Customer: Nahi nahi kuch baat nahi karni hai.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan mam bol rahi hu.
Executive: Hello mam. Mam main bol rahi hu ki kya bolte hain aapko koi bhi dikkat ho mera number hai hi aapke paas. Aap mujhe usi number pe call ya WhatsApp kariye, koi call karega.
Customer: Ji ji mam mujhe direct call kariyega aap, theek hai?
Customer: Haan ji bilkul mam bilkul.
Executive: Okay mam.
Customer: Okay, thank you mam.
Executive: Theek hai mam aapka complaint main close kar dungi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had a complaint regarding Shiv Shankar.

- Customer reported lack of help and support.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed Shiv Shankar issue was resolved.

- Executive offered direct contact for future issues.

- Executive offered to close the complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Complaint will be closed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, resolution, support, feedback
